title: Lida93
author: Lida93
content: This one nah about report wey the CBN don release com out dey refute say the e-naira wey be the Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) say no be threat to financial stability. From the article of the people wey knack dis accusation give the CBN  e-naira Dem de try to tok about how de e-naira no go fit give it users financial stability base on how the value of the Naira dey fall yakata evry tyme. Although Dem no gree mention de name of the media wey sama dis report but from the article nah wetin the report the try to explain be dat.ReadQuoteThe CBN ended its statement by telling users of the e-naira to brace for more changes and modifications to the CBDC which are aimed at improving users’ experience. The bank also told Nigerians to “embrace the technology for, among other things, greater financial inclusion.”The question be say nah who sef the use dis CBN e-naira abi  e get anybodi  unah know wey de use am, and wetin be the person experience since him de or him don use am? Sumtin wey even de country  politicians no dey even use nah Dem de expect us common country pipol to use am.Anoda sumtin wey I just use elderly eye see here be say de CBN just wan use dis medium to mk de e-naira show face again for public ears say e still dey exist since dem launch am, bcos as for me I neva or see even one person wey don tok say him dey use dis e-naira system. How dem go dey encourage pipol to go mk use of sumtin wey no dey or luk reliable, transparent and sustainability sef inno sure.

comments.author: uche6215
comments.body: First of all, I welcome myself back to the forum for the long vacation. Op your Pidgin dey confused but as nigga I fit tok my point put. Me too I see say E-NAIRA no be threat to di hardcopy of the currency because na di same money wey we dey use na dem just create soft copy usage for am so weti dey ground be say di e-naira go even enhance di Nigerian Naira if di government and economic experts do am well. And I believe say na because of the economic downturn in the country through the forex stock exchange dem create am to support the stock exchange to make di Naira strong. But seen that the implementation process is not really favourable to the citizens so it seems that nobody is interested to use it for any transaction. And also this CBDC was created to support di country economy through di commercial banks because the commercial banks service were very poor so by creating the CBDC would fast track and make things and banking system very much easy but things are more complicated and difficult to use and do. Nigeria is a drama scene.There was a time they announced say plenty piple dey use am but I never really hear anyone dey use that app dey do any transaction at anywhere. Abi na hide dem dey hide dey use am? I believed since di CBDC e no dey work again, let dem just use the last option to use adopt bitcoin and use it. If dem, I mean di government adopt bitcoin. Di youth go happy die and di country economy go grow well and strong. Di e-naira no to make people financial stable. Na di copycat for the real economy online so there is no different of the both.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: You dey mind them, maybe na anoda way wey dem want take give e-naira life because the currency don die for long. Dem just dey make noise for news upadan as being the first country in africa to adopt a CBDC. E get the time wey dem dey even brag during the month of March this year, say about 13 million people don download e-naira wallets from playstore, I know no weda na ghost dey make this downloads, because just as you talk I never take my eyes see the currency before and I know no anybody wey dey use the currency. The currency don fail woefully and make dem forget am, make dem use the same energy openly support cryptocurrency for the country.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: With the way these Govt dey quick refute allegate dey make me laff no be small. Dem go just shift from am like say nah shit but if you look am, them actually do am. Make I ask o; you feel say the E-naira wey no bin get much popularity nah wan shake the stability of the local fiat? To think am, the naira no stable so wetin wan shake? Our country no go fit see better tin appreciate am, them go wan counter am and as long as e no go help them loot funds, them no go agree. The E-naira was actually created to divert crypto enthusiasts from using Bitcoin but as we too dey like get comma for our things, the plan no work. Abeg make them carry this their news pack wan side.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: E-Naira has been forgotten long ago, because the government thought that they can ban cryptocurrency and replace it with E-Naira, unknown to them that citizens already know that it is centralized and can be manipulated by our government. So many people rejected it and prefer to continue with cash because it can't be compared to cryptocurrency.This one that they are coming out to tell people about the E-Naira again, it is like they have seen that it that they have failed and can't deceive crypto lovers. I haven't seen anyone using the E-Naira, neither does the politicians uses it. The country has corrupt leaders and that is why the E-Naira will not work because one transactions can be monitored and these politicians doesn't like such. If it is not bitcoin, it cannot serve as bitcoin.
